title: A strong brand and design system for Swapbox
snippet: Building a strong Web3 brand and design system that is intemporal and for all device types

body.raw:
Swapbox is a crypto ATM that does not need to be connected to a centralized exchange. Instead, it uses a smart contract and a stablecoin reserve to perform trades directly on-chain on decentralized exchanges such as Uniswap. ### Building a design system that scale on all types of devices The challenge of designing UI and UX for Swapbox is that has apps on all types of devices: Desktop, mobile and the machine 7" screen. I built the design system with those constraint in mind. ![swapboxx branding](/assets/swapbox-design/brand.svg) ![icons](/assets/swapbox-design/icons.svg) ### Diagrams Explaining Swapbox transaction and the Swapbox ecosystem with simple diagrams understandable by anyone ![swapbox diagram](/assets/swapbox-design/diagram1.svg) ![swapbox diagram](/assets/swapbox-design/diagram2.svg) ### Conference visual support ![swapbox talk](/assets/swapbox-design/talk.svg) ### Various illustrations ![swapbox mascott](/assets/swapbox-design/mascoot.svg) ![swapbox boxes](/assets/swapbox-design/boxes.svg) ### How-Tos gifs

body.html:
Swapbox is a crypto ATM that does not need to be connected to a centralized exchange. Instead, it uses a smart contract and a stablecoin reserve to perform trades directly on-chain on decentralized exchanges such as Uniswap.

Building a design system that scale on all types of devices

The challenge of designing UI and UX for Swapbox is that has apps on all types of devices: Desktop, mobile and the machine 7" screen. I built the design system with those constraint in mind.
